room_title: Escape room "Under Pressure" by Escapology Orland Park in Chicago
review: We did the under pressure Room. It was awesome. Much better than most of the other escape room places we have been to.

room_title: Escape room "Under Pressure" by Escapology Orland Park in Chicago
review: We have done several escape rooms, and without a doubt, Escapology is the best around! We have done both the mansion murder and the under pressure rooms, and both were great. The rooms are very well done, and the staff is extremely friendly and helpful. We will be back soon to try the Shanghai Room!

room_title: Escape room "Under Pressure" by Escapology Orland Park in Chicago
review: The staff (Omar) was friendly and helpful. We really liked that Under Pressure contained multiple rooms and great puzzles that made for an enjoyable experience. It was one of the best escape rooms we've experienced.
